attributes.action: Raise Criminal Charges Against MP's Who Have Claimed Excess Expenses Ans Claim Interest Back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I with to raise this petition beacuse the government will prosecute members of the public for fraud and just because they are Members of Parlement they should not be immune to criminal charges

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
